name: Jessé Alves Galdino
body:
# Skills

#### PHP ecosystem
[Composer] [composer], [Symfony] [symfony], [Mockery] [mockery], [PHPunit] [phpunit]

#### Frontend Developer
[HTML] (http://pt.wikipedia.org/wiki/HTML5), [HTML5] (http://pt.wikipedia.org/wiki/HTML5), [CSS] (http://pt.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cascading_Style_Sheets), [CSS3] (http://pt.wikipedia.org/wiki/CSS3), [Javascript] [javascript],
[Jquery] [jquery], [Twitter Bootstrap] (http://twitter.github.io/bootstrap/)

## Employment History
I have job experience as software and database architect and team leader.

### Software Engineer at [Hi-Mídia - Grupo RBS] [himidia] _February 2011 - Present_
I've worked as software engineer, backend and frontend developer. We have used [Scrum] [scrum] to manage our daily work.

##### System to manage clients and products
I've worked as software engineer, backend developer and frontend developer in a team of 5 members.

techs: [Symfony 1] [symfony1], [PHPunit] [phpunit], [Mockery] [mockery],
[Bower] [bower], [Javascript] [javascript], [Jquery] [jquery], [JqueryUI] [jqueryui], [Composer] [composer]

##### E-mail Marketing Database Administration
I've worked as software engineer, API architect and developer.  
  
techs: [WSSE] [wsse], [JSON] [json], [Symfony] [symfony]
